author: Xbox
description:
In this episode of the Official Xbox Podcast, we're giving you a big update on all things Xbox Ally, Play Anywhere, Game Pass, Cloud Gaming, and more! So, get comfy in your hammocks as Ethan and the Jasons give you all the information you need to know about the latest Xbox news!

00:03 Introduction
00:36 What We're Playing
02:58 What's in the Works
04:04 The Future of Xbox
05:03 Hammock Time
06:00 Cloud Gaming
07:17 Game Pass
08:23 Xbox Insiders
13:36 Xbox Play Anywhere
14:58 Xbox and AMD Partnership 
17:17 Xbox History
19:29 Meeting with Developers
20:18 Q&A | Xbox Ally and Xbox Ally X
28:26 Xbox Play Anywhere
30:01 Outro

Listen to us on Spotify/Apple Podcasts 🎧 
https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/officialxboxpodcast

title: Updates on the Xbox Ally, Play Anywhere, Game Pass, and More | Official Xbox Podcast

author: Xbox
description:
Bampuku and Mutsumi have defeated the demons that threaten their village. But further challenges await, and difficult decisions must be made...

Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree - demo is now out on Xbox Series X|S #TowaGame

Pre-order and find out more now: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/towa-and-the-guardians-of-the-sacred-tree-deluxe-edition-pre-order/9N72PM6K7FWB/0017
